wikipedia_page.main: Patrick Daniel Joseph Wright (born 17 November 1940) is an English football coach and former professional player who made 230 appearances in the Football League playing for Birmingham City, Shrewsbury Town, Derby County, Southend United and Rotherham United. He played as a full back. He has coached at club and national level all over the world.

response: Patrick or Pat Wright may refer to:
*Pat Wright (footballer) (born 1940), English football coach and former player
